title: JSON schema for Webpack's bootstrap-loader configuration file

extractStyles.description: Enables/disables extraction of styles to a standalone CSS file using extract-text-webpack-plugin

appStyles.description: Import your custom styles here. Usually this endpoint file contains a list of @imports of your application styles.

bootstrapCustomizations.description: The .scss file path to be loaded after Bootstrap's _variables.scss file

bootstrapVersion.description: The major version of Bootstrap being used

loglevel.description: The verbosity of logging. Exclude this property to disable.

preBootstrapCustomizations.description: The .scss file path to be loaded before Bootstrap's _variables.scss file

styleLoaders.description: An array of Webpack loader names. Order matters, and sass-loader is required.

useCustomIconFontPath.description: Set to true if using a custom icon font and you need to specify its path in your Sass files

useFlexbox.description: Enables/disables the flexbox model available in Bootstrap 4

env.description: Sets the extractStyles property based on the value of NODE_ENV
